LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon.label: Huge Weapon Organ
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon.description: This weapon organ is quite large and can only be used by large Arachnae Swarm Nodes (body size greater than 2.0).
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Acid.label: Arachnae Acid
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Acid.description: When this weapon organ's projectile hits an enemy, it leaves acid on the target that causes sustained damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Toxid.label: Arachnae Toxin
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Toxid.description: When this weapon organ's projectile hits an enemy, it injects a toxin into the target, causing poisoning.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Spawn.label: Arachnae Sub-Hive
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Spawn.description: The primary attack method of this weapon organ is releasing auxiliary insects. Some will throw the auxiliary insects directly at the enemy, while others will cause the auxiliary insects to track and latch onto enemy forces to deal damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_ChainReload.label: Chain Reload
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_ChainReload.description: This weapon organ releases hormones with each attack to speed up the metabolic rate, which manifests as increased firing speed and reload speed.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_OverPenetrate.label: Over-Penetration
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_OverPenetrate.description: When this weapon organ's projectile hits an enemy, it does not stop but penetrates all enemies in its path, dealing damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_LightingChain.label: Psionic Lightning Chain
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_LightingChain.descript: This weapon organ fires a lightning chain that bounces between enemies, dealing damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Icez.label: Extreme Freeze Shatter
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Icez.description: This weapon organ freezes enemies, a state that makes the target's body structure extremely fragile. As this effect deepens, the "freezing" damage threshold required to destroy body parts will be significantly reduced.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_FrostExplode.label: Frost Explosion
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_FrostExplode.descripti: The frost mist fired by this weapon organ can contaminate enemies; contaminated enemies will explode again.
